title: Sea bass with mango sauce
ingredients: ['50g butter', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '1 mango, peeled and cubed', '1 teaspoon honey', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '4 tablespoons dry white wine, such as Chardonnay', '1/2 teaspoon crushed chillies', 'sea salt to taste', '4 (175g) fillets sea bass', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'white pepper to taste']
